about_the_game:
In strike zero, you will play a girl who has lost her memory by integrating with the "Pi" fragment. In the near future, you will fly a new combat aircraft as a trainee pilot of the first fleet and experience a series of unique adventures. As the story goes on, you will gradually fall into surreal dreams and find clues to promote the plot. All forces will appear and begin to compete, and the world will be in crisis because of frequent visions and monsters. At this time, you will gradually recovering your memory and try to save this chaotic world.

Unique fighting methods to reshape the fun of barrage games

In this game, you will drive the "Pi combat aircraft" to fight around the world. Different from the traditional barrage game, your combat aircraft will realize its omni-directional movement through a single direction engine most of the time, which conforms to the rules of some physical engines. This will give you a similar experience of fighting in the air as you brush past the enemy.

Full fire! Rush to the enemies! Although it may break your head and bleed, it won't lead to your death. "Pi combat aircraft" has a shield that can be continuously strengthened, which can help you resist damage, offset impact, so as to ensure you to fully release your combat effectiveness!

The combat aircraft not only defines the growth direction, attack, protection and mobility, but also configures weapons with different styles to bring you different combat experience. You will fight with your enemies in various areas, or soar in the broad sky, or hide deep in the dark underground caves, so as to constantly defeat all kinds of enemies and finally break free from the shackles of fate.

Complete plot experience to choose your final destiny:

In this game, you will experience a complete main plot. At the same time, as the plot goes on, you will form a deeper understanding of the roles and positions of various forces in the future world in the new context of the game. All kinds of intelligence will eventually be gathered in the center of the stage where players are located. You will try to dispel the fog and solve the mystery of the protagonist's life experience. Moreover, your choice will also affect the subsequent plot!

Changeable battle scenes

As the game goes on, you will fight in different scenes. You need to fight in different environments and landforms, and even encounter unexpected scenes in some chapters. These scenes will have varying degrees of impact on the players' flight strategies and battle strategies.

How to hit the enemy moving at high speed in the distorted broad sky? How to avoid the pursuit of the enemy in the narrow tunnel? How to achieve rapid advance in a space full of obstacles? How to obtain ammunition supply in case of suffocation and lack of ammunition? How to touch the treasure that seems to be in front of you in an environment that is almost completely out of control?……Many challenges like this will continue to appear, but we also believe that you will show your own solutions!
Of course, you will also experience the pleasure of fighting in these extreme special environments!

Unique exploration scene

In addition to the checkpoint, you can also play the protagonist to explore in a variety of scenes. Moreover, you can talk to the members of the fleet to trigger different plots and get some clues about the direction of the branch plot. Maybe you will also get some unexpected gains. Although all this is not necessary... But for you, maybe these parts outside the battle are what you really need?
After the fierce battle, you can go to the beautiful island cafe for a short rest to enjoy the blue sky, blue sea and beach. This may be a good way for you to relax~

Fragment integration upgrade, free enhancement route


"Pi" fragments have self-awareness to a certain extent. In the game, players can talk with "it" through the watch they wear on their wrists. While constantly exploring themselves, clues to promote the subsequent plot will continue to appear.
After absorbing the "Pi" fragments of various monsters in battle, you will have a unique talent dial to strengthen and improve your abilities when driving a combat aircraft. At the same time, the aircraft will be equipped with an additional enhanced system.
Through the unique reinforcement of the combat aircraft and yourself, you will get a better game fighting experience.

of course! It doesn't matter if you don't strengthen the combat aircraft! Enjoy extreme games! Do you want to try to strengthen your enemies?

We hope you can find your favorite playing methods and genres in the game, have more fun, and enjoy this adventure different from daily life. We hope you are willing to spend time exploring the game content in depth. We also hope that every player can feel and enjoy the content of the whole game.

Come to strike zero and fight for your destiny!
